Blog.post: i'm having my IT lesson rite now..argh...such a boring dae.penat seh ktawe..all coz of san2 n wati buat lawak...sakit perot kush..byk bende kene type in my IT lesson todae..waduh..kompem tgn kush cramp.saw my kak dimple todae...she waved at me~hahahah...so happpiiiiii.. =)well he kene buat housekiping smlm..no wonder he didnt reply my msgs..ni pon dier thg slp..he said he got a surprise for me...no idea wats itz all about...heard kak qis masok hospital sak...accident..not sure dah brape lame..rite now no photos for me to post..waiting 4 my kak sdare to come back frm langkawi n get the photos ready...den i can get it frm her n i'll post it here..hehehe..i tink dats for now cos nid to do my werk..tatapi. *PeAcE*

Arrluu..peepz out der~well..juz started blogging so not much to write...juz a lil on myself..i'm quite shy at times..n cheerful @moz times.if can,wants to kip smiling..lolx~rite now i'm skuling in ITE east Bishan taking accounting course..Ferz yr student..juz started tis july..quite a tiring 1 for the ferz few daez but began to enjoy myself as daez passed by..so u peepz,juz stay cheerful n never give up anything half way..peace*

its sat...so faz time flies...i didnt get enuf slp...so sleepy..smlm the newly weds,came here..hehehe..abg dudi n kak idah..the pics r readi..3 album lagik...but i like the dinner album...so nice...n so beautiful.wen i get it,i'll post it here ya?so u ppl can c how pleasant looking tis couple r..hehe..yesterdae was quite a tiring 1...balik skul je tros condemn.tk cukup tido..dats d reason...ngan baju skul skali ku slp...buruk prangai...wakakaka~bout dat saiful..i tink i noe him..but i dunnoe azri lar...been guessing if tis azri is saiful n tis saiful is azri...in other werdz,they r d same person...cume menyamar to b org lain...i hate tis kind of peep ekcueli...yelar...tkde keje lain nk menyamar jadi org lain n kacau org..
oh ya..lupe nk ask pendapat...nice tk name tiara syazliyana??nice or not?he gave dat name to me...tiara syazliyana or lisha nadira???which 1??i nid some of ur viewpoints...hehehe...tillnow,i'm waiting for dat pic to arrive..hope it arrives as soon as possible as promised..hmm...datz 4 now.c ya sumtime to come...n slamat pengantin baru to d newly weds... *Dudi Arfan N Siti Nurhidah* semoga kekal hingga ke akhir hayat...*PeAcE*

Hmmzz....tk abez2 org kacau aku...aiyer~dat dae my ex skulmate kacau².Den now tis guy named azri.he said hez from ite bb..not so sure if its true or not...arghh!!!nk kip low profile pon tkleh...ade je yg mengganggu.he said he got my no frm a guy named saiful..pple panggil die bob.frm ite bb gak...waduh²dunnoe wat to sae lar...nk tukar no tapi leceh..anti kene tell pple here and der...isk~wat i'm supposed to do?,y special sum1 tu pon senyap je dr tadik...me msg him in the morning while waiting for fad kat ut mrt station but no respond....aiyer~so damn bored sia..skrg nga it lesson but dier ajar bende yg basic in doing powerpoint.datz d reason i take tis opportunity to blog.hehehehe =)

back to blog again...hehehe..in my IT klas todae...quite bored..juz wondering till now...mane photo tu tk sampai²???hmm..it will b sent as soon as possible..ade project for me to complete..so many²...strez strez strez..!!!smlm had so called misunderstanding wit him but in d end back as per normal...syg him so much² n many²..anti lau dah get dat photo,i'll post it here...insyaAllah...hehehe..well..dunnoe wat to write now..baru starting of the dae mahh~so nothing much hapen.argh!!my hp batt tgl 2 bar je...forgot to charge smlm..todae goin back at 6.30~ade tarian...k lar peepz...to you pple yg nga bace my blog ni,take care n diam² tau...jgn spread mcm butter ehk...n to at special sum1..if u're reading tis,love abg deep² *MuAcKz* *PeAcE*

Hmm....sundaes..end of evri week...there can b many things that hapen to us within tis week...up to the individual on how to handle it...cehdebah...hehehwell,4 me,its quite a shocking week...ayie,ex of mine,gi japan on the 16...smlm la kan???hmm..he will b there 4 1 yr...wow~such a long period of time..gonna mish him...another shocking news..althoough its not dat shocking..sam..my ex noes firdauz makrip tu...aiyo..wat small werld...small singapore to b exact..hehehe...arh shit~my accounting n business fundamentals lom buat!oh nno...mati².my dearie lak nga saket..aiyo..risau kush...saket2 nk go werk..dah soh call manager n told him not to go to werk dier degil...still can sae ade awek so he cant ponteng werk Eeeee~geram gak ngan dier kekdg...veri slambe...tis tues ade tarian...san² nk quit...den wat bout me???alone...argh..me sbenarnye paiseh² nk go alone as i'm not too used to the environment n kakak² tarian der...sure strez if cant get along dat well wif dem as soon as possible...

hmmm...now in IT klaz...as usual...blogging!but todae the teacher is not here yet.no photos for me to update yet..my comp cant access to the internet due to some network faulty..dunnoe who tgn gatal gode²...haizz...quite bored..wati is not here yet..yehuu...tis coming fri dez no lesson...yesterdae i slept extra early....@ 8!wow...never slept dat early b4..me dearie abg also didnt msg...maeb hes still sleeping..i saw my kakak dimple todae...hehehe...shes so cute n adorable...but i seldom talk to her...wish to talk to her sumtimes but dunnoe how...nk quit tarian but nanti tk dpt jumpe die lagi...Hmm..my frens all wants to join bridge leaders...skrg ni pon nga dgr lagu dr discman maya..jiwangz~hehehehe~i msg noordeen but no reply...gd~ ni pon idea shidah...mintakaku tlg kacau noordeen todae i'm going to pasir irs beach..nk p collect sand..for our tree project.tis few daez i have d feeling of going back to my ex secondary skul...but tkde kwn...nk jumpe ina,cinda,kembar...n d tarian gerls...n not forgetting bdk² kompang like hanif...bob...n sesape lar...rindu plak ngan dorg...hanif plak aku ade gak nampak dier kekdg kat mrt station mase nga tunggu fadiah..K la...got to do sum werk...*PeAcE*

arluu....i'm back to blog again...wakakaka~heres a song...malay song lar...
dlm hidup tk seindah yg tersirat dlm cinta tk seasyik yg diduga dlm hati ada cinta yg terbiar entah bertahun ku siram kasih bersarang dlm jiwa
dikau hadir bagai selembut sutera terpesona dlm diam ku terlena membuai impian cinta kita sehingga ku tenggelam dlm arus yg menyiksakan...
kasih..tidak pernah ku meminta selain cinta dan kejujuran hatimu cinta dlm meniti usia punah semua saat yg bahagia..oh~
di mana kelembutan yg ada dulu kasih merana dlm senyuman ku meratap sedih selendang sutera yg menjadi saksinya cinta kita yg tertulis kini telah berakhir....
dgrkanlah ucapan sendu hatiku kenangilah erti cinta yg bermula kembalilah agar bisa ku merubah terangi hati agar bersinar di dlm percintaan
oh kekasih simpan kenangan buatmu untuk daku yang masih ada di sini kerasnya hatimu untuk kembali ak terdaya ku tanggung penyeksaan yang abadi dalam selembut sutera

Hie~i'm at my bf klaz rite now...so bored..lagi² nga pain in the stomach..arghhh~mcm malas nk PE arh but no mc so cant escape...todae i'm not going for my tarian..peyut ku sakit semcm seh....cannot take itr...balik anti nk go lot 1 n buy sum stufz.been waiting for him to msg since morning...onli now he msg..but at liz he did rather den he don rite??? ;p yest nan ask me out to esplanade to c the fireworks...but i cant coz my dad dont allow...arghhh!so bored staying at hm the whole day..in the afternoon,i watched Pontianak Harum Sundal Malam...nice stori..it was supposedly to b scary one due to the title but in the end its not...although some part of it was scary...maeb juz 15% of it...the rest was quite a sad one...tis sat iqah plan an outing but not so sure if it..gonna ask her for confirmation later...not in any mood todae lar...i'm not enjoying wat i'm doing in skul todae....well,i tink i stop here for now..lesen ending liaoz...so datz it...gtg..having my PE after tis...takin care~ *PeAcE*

hmm...tis few daez i dun feel dat happy n enjoying myself..wanna noe y?he didnt msg me at all...for 2 days straight..wat do u expect me to do?wait n wait n wait mcm tunggu buah tk jatuh..y is he kiping quiet?is der aniting bad hapen?my mind juz couldnt stop tinking negative.well,dat dae i met up with cam n zach.zach change alot sia.almost couldnt recognised him.den we sat down n have a chat...after dat,we went to fauzee's house.zach wanted to return his baju kurung.we sat n have a drink den cam n zach played fauzee's xbox.well,rite now i dunnoe wat to write.juz dat we're not dat closed to san2 anymore...she attitude lar...dunnoe wat happen to her...k lar my dear bloggie...gtg coz nid to do werk,moreover,i dun have d mood sangat...k lar...off~
